result.arabic_text: ثُمَّ رُدُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوۡلَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ أَلَا لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَهُوَ أَسۡرَعُ ٱلۡحَٰسِبِينَ
result.translation: 62.Tohuk lakal Rabe mari ken Yallay cakki awlatuh keenik yani fanah gacsiman, oobbiya! Qhiyaamah ayró mekla lem Yallaay usuk cisab abba haa marak cisaabah sissikuk Raaqak.
